articles.title: Carlos Santana collapses on stage during performance near Detroit - CBS News
articles.description: The 74-year-old musician was performing in Clarkston, Michigan, when he collapsed.
articles.content:
Guitar legend Carlos Santana is recovering after he collapsed on stage during a concert near Detroit on Tuesday night.
